function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Recirculated air can lead to higher COVID-19 infection rates in closed environments","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Avoid recirculation of air and treat recirculated air if necessary","Technologies":"Air treatment systems, UV-C light disinfection","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Ventilation in congested indoor spaces can lead to virus-containing particles reaching residents before filtration","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and exposure to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement enhanced ventilation strategies, consider pressurization, dilution, and air purification","Technologies":"Enhanced ventilation systems, pressurization systems, air purification technologies","People":"Building occupants, engineers, architects","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Airborne transmission of COVID-19 is increased in indoor environments with relaxed restrictions","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Implement effective measures such as social distancing, self-isolation, and air and surface cleaning","Technologies":"UV-C light disinfection, air and surface cleaning technologies","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
